text.__SUMMARY__: Fritillaria yuminensis is a plant species native to the northwestern part of Xinjiang Province in northwestern China. It grows in open grassy hillsides at elevations of 1800–3500 m.Fritillaria yuminensis is a bulb-producing perennial with a purple stem up to 50 cm tall. Flowers are nodding, bell-shaped, either pink or blue with no markings.
